name: 10 Second Lander
description:
NOTE: The browser version has some performance problems, especially in Firefox.

Lunar lander clone with a 10 second time limit with randomly generated levels.

Game developed for Mini Jam 130 (Theme: Lunar / 10 Seconds)

How to Play

You have 10 seconds to land your lunar module in the pad.

Watch out to not crash into anything and make sure to:

  • Land slowly
  • Land upright
  • Land with all feet on the pad

Are you good enough to land your ship during night time as well? ;)

Controls:

  • Left/Right arrows: Rotate your ship
  • Space/Up Arrow: Engage thrusters

Dev notes

The font used is a modified version of Gravity Pixel.
